advantages-main-text-1: Reconstruction of an apartment in a panel house in 30 days
advantages-secondary-text-1: We will complete the apartment in a panel house with an area of up to 80 m2 and prepare it for occupancy in 30 working days
advantages-main-text-2: Contract with a guarantee of up to 24 months and liability insurance
advantages-secondary-text-2: Before the reconstruction, we will conclude a contract in which the conditions, prices and deadlines are clearly set. Then we start
advantages-main-text-3: Work carried out under constant control
advantages-secondary-text-3: The quality of the work is ensured by an authorized construction supervisor, who also takes a photo and documents everything. You can watch everything from a distance
BacCall-title: We will call you in 24 hours
